Name: Combots
About the game: Combots is a free multiplayer robot war shooter set in fully procedurally generated maps. 5 unique robots allow you to experience the game in a new way when playing for each of them. 21 items for loadout, allow you to create many variations of robots. 4 procedurally generated maps. Each game you will be greeted by a new map for battle. 6 game modes that will dilute the fun.
Meta Title: Combots: Jul 8, 2021, HardEdge Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Combots? Check out the release date (Jul 8, 2021), developer insights from HardEdge Games, and a complete game summary.
